column4: Is there a separate channel for X?  If not, I'm looking for an X expert.  :-)  I'm wondering if two users, on two different computers, can use the same X server on a single computer, thus sharing the environment, seeing each others' mouse pointers, etc.
But, yeah, you can use VNC.
The problem with VNC is that the other user can't 1) have their own cursor and mouse pointer and 2) drag windows to another workspace to use them herself for a little while
